verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You have been given The name above all names. And we worship You, yes we worship You. You have been given The name above all names. And we worship You, yesÂ we worship You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You have redeemed us From every nation And we worship You, yes we worship You. You have redeemed us From every nation. And we worship You, yes we worship You.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}We are Your people, Made for Your glory And we worship You, yes we worship You. We are Your people, Made for Your glory And we worship You, yes we worship You.{/lang-eng}
